data.name: Academy of Magic: The Great Dark Wizard's Curse
data.detailed_description:
In the third part of the magical match3 serial, your goal is to help Dennis to break the curse and save the "Academy of Magic" from a dark sorcerer. Dennis has lived his entire life as an orphan on the streets of London, performing magic tricks to survive while he wonders what happened to his parents. That all changes when he steps through a portal and finds himself in another world – a world of magic.

Fascinated by the new world he’s found himself in, Dennis agrees to do what he can to save the school of magical arts. But the wizard who cursed the school still has followers, and breaking the curse might not be as simple a task as it sounds.

- An exciting tale of magic
- Enjoy challenging match-3 levels
- Follow Dennis’s adventures across 5 chapters
- 20 exciting scenes
- An entertaining and lively cast of characters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows ME/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
